_comment: Known CVEs for common Windows kernel driver families. Used by driver_triage.py for prior CVE history scoring.

cves.detail: Kernel write-what-where in Qcamain10x64.sys WLAN driver service
Race condition in Atheros ath9k/ath10k WiFi driver leaks cleartext frames
OOB read in Qualcomm WLAN driver nl80211 handler
Zero-click buffer overflow in MediaTek WiFi chipset wappd service (CVSS 9.8)
NULL pointer dereference in MediaTek Bluetooth driver
OOB write in MediaTek WLAN AP driver due to incorrect bounds check
AsIO3.sys authorization bypass in IRP_MJ_CREATE handler (CVSS 8.8)
AsIO3.sys stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability
ASUS Armoury Crate driver allows arbitrary MSR/PhysMem access
Samsung device drivers allow unauthorized access to phone functions
Samsung driver clipboard data access vulnerability
RTKVHD64.sys Realtek HD Audio driver IOCTL arbitrary code execution
Realtek USB WiFi driver allows unprivileged user to cause BSOD
Realtek WiFi driver race condition leading to crash
NVIDIA GPU Display Driver privilege escalation vulnerability
nvlddmkm.sys DxgkDdiEscape OOB read leading to code execution
NVIDIA GPU kernel mode layer NULL-pointer dereference
nvlddmkm.sys DxgkDdiEscape unvalidated pointer use (CVSS 8.8)
nvlddmkm.sys unvalidated array index in DxgkDdiEscape (CVSS 8.8)
Incomplete cleanup in Intel PROSet/Wireless WiFi drivers before v22.0
Intel Wireless Bluetooth driver improper buffer restrictions allowing escalation
Intel Wireless Bluetooth incorrect input validation allows DoS via adjacent access
Intel PROSet/Wireless WiFi improper input validation leading to DoS
Broadcom brcmfmac WiFi driver heap buffer overflow via Wake-on-WLAN
Broadcom brcmfmac firmware event frame validation bypass
Kr00k: Broadcom/Cypress WiFi chips send data encrypted with zeroed key
SynTP.sys leaks multiple kernel addresses to unprivileged user mode processes
Synaptics TouchPad driver keystroke logging capability exposed
Oracle VM VirtualBox Windows host privilege escalation via VBoxDrv
VirtualBox Core vulnerability allowing takeover via guest-to-host escape
VirtualBox Core vulnerability exploited at Pwn2Own 2023
VBoxDrv.sys input validation flaw allows kernel code execution (used by Turla APT)
VMware ESXi arbitrary write via HGFS - exploited in ransomware campaigns
VMware Workstation/Fusion use-after-free in XHCI USB controller
VMware Workstation/Fusion OOB read in SCSI sharing functionality
Npcap installer NSIS race condition allows SYSTEM privilege escalation
WinPcap NPF.SYS BIOCGSTATS IOCTL handler memory overwrite and code execution
